ui.item: There is no file "music.txt" or folder "Music" in the selected folder. They can be created if you are sure that the selected folder is a Mount & Blade module folder. Dou you wish them to be created?

One or more music file referred in "music.txt" is missing and is marked to remove. Hint: I you have a copy of a missing file you can recover the entry by unchecking it's checkbox and browsing the existing copy.
Some changes have not been saved. If you close this modul now these changes will be lost. Are you sure that you want to close the modul?
Not all music types was identified. It may be caused by loading an unknown module. (Hint: Further modules can be added by editing types-EN.xml.)
